text: Michael Buffer (born November 2, 1944) is an American ring announcer for boxing and professional wrestling matches. He is known for his trademarked catchphrase, "Let's get ready to rumble!". He is also known for creating the announcing style in which he rolls certain letters and adds other emphasis to a fighter's name. , the catchphrase has generated $400 million in revenue from licensing the trademark. In 2008, Buffer was treated for throat cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:American television presenters Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:WWE people
title: Michael Buffer
